activities: Knowledge Sharing Systems is a provider of software that helps our clients manage data related to intellectual data, including patents, license agreements, and technology disclosures.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: KSS processes data related to intellectual data; minimal personal data is retained by the system.  Software, in the majority of cases is maintained at the client site, however, hosting at the KSS Corporate site is available at the clients request.
recoursemech: Independent dispute resolution is available through BBB EU SAFE HARBOR at http://www.bbb.org/us/european-dispute-resolution/consumer/
